summary: Implements Oracleâ€‘specific logic for creating, configuring, and destroying databases used by Django, especially test schemas. It extends the generic creation base to handle Oracle constraints such as user/schema creation, tablespace management, isolation level settings, and cleanup of temporary test databases.
business_intent: Enable Django applications to programmatically set up and tear down Oracle databases (primarily for testing) without manual intervention, ensuring isolated environments and proper resource handling.
